authors.name: Keith Taylor
authors.affiliation: Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis

title: My Friend FRED®: The St. Louis Fed’s Free Tool for Economic Data
description: FRED is the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis' signature economic database, providing over 61,000 frequently updated data series on various economic indicators, including federal debt, personal saving rate, and unemployment rate, among others.
keywords: Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis
